text:
North Face Among Sponsors of LGBTQ Camp Where 12-Year-Olds Can Perform in Drag. The North Face sponsors an LGBTQ camp where children as young as 12 can perform in drag, and housing and bathrooms are "genderless."
The post North Face Among Sponsors of LGBTQ Camp Where 12-Year-Olds Can Perform in Drag appeared first on Breitbart.
